message:
The list is obsoleted. For instance Profile259 is using a Nuget target of portable45-net45+win8+wp8+wpa81

Hypertext Transfer Protocol  
 GET /nexus/service/local/nuget/xxxxxxx/Search()?$filter=IsLatestVersion&searchTerm=yyyyyyy'&targetFramework='portable45-net45%2Bwin8%2Bwp8%2Bwpa81'&includePrerelease=false&$skip=0&$top=26&semVerLevel=2.0.0 HTTP/1.1\r\n  
 Accept: application/atom+xml, application/xml\r\n  
 user-agent: NuGet Client V3/4.4.0 (Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.14393.0, VS Professional/15.0)\r\n  
 X-NuGet-Client-Version: 4.4.0\r\n  
 Accept-Language: en-US\r\n  
 Host: xxxxxxxxxxxx:8080\r\n  
 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate\r\n  
 Connection: Keep-Alive\r\n

Nuget is one of the most confusing and frustrating technologies I ever used. Documentation is hard to find and more often than not incorrect.
